item.description: About General I am a 20 year old university student currently living in Lamia, Greece and traveling around the world! Recently returned from the beautiful city of Vilnius, Lithuania! Education I am an undergraduate student at the University of Thessaly, studying Biomedical Informatics and I also hold a Software Engineering diploma. I also have experience in teaching computer science to highschool students. Cybersecurity Huge Cybersecurity enthusiast with a lot of love for Reverse Engineering, PWN and Cryptography.

Contact Me Feel free to contact me for anything you need! I’d be happy to help with any questions or to just chat. Email For academic inquiries: grellias@uth.gr For everything else: grrellias@protonmail.com Linkedin My Linkedin Page Instagram My public Instagram Page @georgerellias Twitter My Twitter @RRellias
